basic.description:
Comparative studies in the history of women and their experiences. Topics will vary from year to year.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Topics in Women's History

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
